mean_cn: n. 血统，家谱，出身，门第，（纯种家畜的）血统表，纯种，（语言的）起源
mean_en: If a dog, cat, or other animal has a pedigree, its ancestors are known and recorded. An animal is considered to have a good pedigree when all its known ancestors are of the same type.
sentence: This pedigree cat has a certificate to prove its bloodline.
sentence_trans: 这只纯种猫有一份证书来这证明它的血统。
